alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:13AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Monday was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 12.4 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Illinois River Valley City 14.0 14.3 Mon 10 am 14.0 13.7 13.4 13.1 12.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
